benchmark_details.name: 4KPro
benchmark_details.overview: 4KPro is a benchmark that evaluates visual perception at 4K resolution in four professional use cases including autonomous vehicle, household, gaming, and UI understanding, consisting of image QA pairs that are only solvable at 4K resolution.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To effectively evaluate 4K-resolution perception in real-world tasks, providing a new benchmark for high-resolution visual understanding in multimodal systems.

data.source: Collection of 75M high-resolution images with 282M pairs of local bounding boxes and detailed captions about salient regions, gathered from various datasets including DataComp and IDL.
data.annotation: Generated using a pipeline that involves detecting salient regions and captioning them with an MLLM.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the correct answers to QA pairs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in answering questions requiring 4K resolution visual understanding.
